descriptionHtml:
I been working on this all day and for my first full costume I am pretty impressed with it.

This pack contains Steel and Nordplate Armour with Steel Weapons (Claymore and Sword) aswel as my re-itteration of the Imperial Shield.  I have put all these together to create one costume in a sense rather than just rehauling the whole range of weapons. (I may do this at another time).

I have tried to stick to a colour scheme that would fit in well with the game but add a little colour to what I would say was a sumwhat..dull vanilla theme.  This is my own personal opinion and I dont expect others to think the same :)

I have uploaded the pack in a .rar format that should work with both refular download and download manager (if not please let me know and ill try fix it).

Anyways I hope you enjoy looking at and using this outfit as much as I enjoyed creating it :)
author: Daniel Bourne

files.name: Customised Steel Armour Themed Outfit RePAck
files.fileName: Customised Steel Armour Themed Outfit RePAck-976-1-0-1.rar
